verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've heard it said that a man would climb a mountain
Just to be with the one he loves.
How many times has he broken that promise -
It has never been done.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
I've never climbed the highest mountain,
but I walked the hill of Calvary...

verse.name: c1
v2
verse.lines:
I've heard it said that a man would swim the ocean
Just to be with the one he loves.
Well all those dreams are an empty emotion -
It can never be done.

verse.name: p2
verse.lines:
I never swam the deepest oceans,
but I walked upon the raging sea...

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
And I know that you don't understand the fullness of my love,
How I died upon the cross for your sins.
And I know that you don't realize how much I gave you,
And I promise I would do it all again.

verse.name: c2
